product_name: Von Zipper Ling Ling Polarized Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: VonZipper Ling Ling Polarized Sunglasses for women open up a whole new window to the world with their glare-cutting, UV ray zapping polarized lenses and fab styling. Gray Ling Ling lenses block 100% of harmful UV rays and 90% of visible light. Polarized lenses cut glare from water, sand, snow and asphalt. Base 8 spherical lenses are made from shatter-resistant polycarbonate and provide some side coverage for your eyes. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames remain flexible at any temperature and are extremely impact resistant. VonZipper Ling Ling Polarized Sunglasses for women have stainless-steel optical hinges for durability.
short_description: VonZipper Ling Ling Polarized Sunglasses for women open up a whole new window to the world with their glare-cutting, UV ray zapping polarized lenses and fab styling.
